text.autoconfig.shulkerboxtooltip.title: 界伏盒小提示 設定
text.autoconfig.shulkerboxtooltip.option:
If on, the preview is always displayed,
regardless of the preview key being pressed.

在壓縮模式下，如何壓縮有不同的NBT標籤的相同物品
忽略：
 忽略 NBT 標籤
第一個方案：
 項顯示為所有具有
 與第一個專案相同的 NBT標籤
獨立：
 用不同的 NBT 標籤分離專案
Controls whether the preview window should be colored.

The max number of items in a row
May not affect modded containers

Swaps the preview modes.
If true, pressing the preview key will show the full preview instead.

Locks the preview window above the tooltip.
When locked, the window will not adapt when out of screen.

If on, the client will try to send packets to servers
to allow extra preview information
such as ender chest previews.

The theme to use for preview windows.
Modded Auto:
 ShulkerBoxTooltip's style using the dark mode setting from LibGui,
 defaults to light theme is not present.
Modded Light:
 ShulkerBoxTooltip's style with vanilla colors.
Modded Dark:
 ShulkeBoxTooltip's style with gray preview windows instead of white.
Vanilla:
 Mimics the style of vanilla bundle previews.
If on, large item counts in compact previews will be shortened

Shows info about the current loot table of the item if present.
Visible only when Tooltip Type is set to Modded.
Hide:
 No loot table info, default.
Simple:
 Displays whether the stack uses a loot table.
Advanced:
 Shows the loot table used by the item.
Controls whether the key hints in the container's tooltip should be displayed.

使用的提示類型樣式
原版:
使用原版提示樣式(顯示開頭5件物品)
模組版:
使用模組的提示樣式
無:
沒有提示

If on, the mod hides the custom text on shulker box tooltips.
Use this option when a server-side preview datapack clashes with the mod.

Press this key when hovering a container stack
to open the preview window

Press this key when hovering a container stack
to open the full preview window
These options are for the servers to set. On multiplayer, changing these options from this menu will not affect the server's configuration.

If on, the server will be able to provide extra information
about containers to the clients with the mod installed.
Disabling this option will disable all of the options below.

Changes the way the ender chest content preview is synchronized.
None:
 No synchronization,
 prevents clients from seeing a preview of their ender chest.
Active:
 Ender chest contents are synchronized when changed.
Passive:
 Ender chest contents are synchonized
 when the client opens a preview.
